prompt: Okay, so you associate Smell as something negative about smoking Please describe a time where you were worried about the smell of cigarettes but ended up smoking
response: My stepdad hates the smell of cigarettes so I do my best to try to avoid smelling like smoke even though I am a smoker. Mainly out of respect and understanding that it's not the best smell in the world.
original_reflection: You are concerned about the smell of cigarettes because they make you feel bad.
new_reflection: The only way we will ever know how much nicotine there really is (or whether or NOT they are actually harmful) would be by looking into this question again later when our children grow older!

prompt: Please describe a time where you were worried about the smell of cigarettes and you didn't smoke
response: When I was going to my doctor. I refrained from smoking on the way so she wouldn't smell it and be reminded to lecture me about smoking.
original_reflection: You are concerned with how others will perceive your actions or thoughts when you don't smoke.
new_reflection: If there's no problem or any reason for not being concerned please explain why this happened (I will try again later)
